title: TTC_03062014.7z
description:
Brought to you by http://www.mmocast.com/

Team XXLGAMES is proud to present the latest version of the ArcheAge English Conversion.
(This patch is compatible with the latest game client)

Team XXLGAMES is a group of dedicated AA fans who would like to offer the English Community the best possible experience. The team is taking over patch development from the original translated patch, which was based off Google Translate, since the original developer is no longer active.

Changelog:
- Almost completely fixed Skill Trees
- 200+ changes to UI, skills, crafting, combat log, chat log, etc.

Installation Instructions:
1) Extract .7z
2) Open patch.bat and edit it, so that it points to the game_pak of your AA Installation.
3) Run patch.bat
Do not move any files out of the extracted folder.
